metadata.description: Risk register for compliance dashboard heat map visualization

risks.title: Data Breach via API Endpoints
risks.mitigationPlan: Implemented rate limiting, input validation, and JWT authentication

risks.title: AI Model Bias in Lead Scoring
risks.mitigationPlan: Implement bias detection metrics and fairness constraints

risks.title: GDPR Non-Compliance in Data Retention
risks.mitigationPlan: Automated data retention policies and consent management implemented

risks.title: Third-Party Dependency Vulnerabilities
risks.mitigationPlan: Dependabot alerts and weekly security scans configured

risks.title: Inadequate Access Controls
risks.mitigationPlan: Current RBAC implementation meets requirements for MVP

risks.title: Performance Degradation Under Load
risks.mitigationPlan: Acceptable risk for current user base; monitor and scale as needed

risks.title: Incomplete Audit Logging
risks.mitigationPlan: Comprehensive audit logging implemented for all sensitive operations

risks.title: API Rate Limiting Bypass
risks.mitigationPlan: Multi-layer rate limiting in place; residual risk accepted

risks.title: Insecure Configuration Management
risks.mitigationPlan: Vault integration and environment variable best practices followed

risks.title: Supply Chain Attack via npm
risks.mitigationPlan: Package lock files, integrity checks, and limited dependency scope

risks.title: Unencrypted Data at Rest
risks.mitigationPlan: Database-level encryption enabled; acceptable for current threat model

risks.title: Insufficient Input Validation
risks.mitigationPlan: Zod schemas validate all inputs at API boundaries

risks.title: Session Hijacking
risks.mitigationPlan: HttpOnly cookies, secure flags, and session rotation implemented

risks.title: Unpatched Production Systems
risks.mitigationPlan: Monthly patching cycle established; critical patches applied within 48h

risks.title: Lack of Business Continuity Plan
risks.mitigationPlan: BCP documented and tested; recovery procedures defined

risks.title: Insufficient Logging for Forensics
risks.mitigationPlan: Current logging sufficient for compliance; enhanced forensics planned for Phase 2

risks.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
risks.mitigationPlan: React auto-escapes output; CSP headers configured
